title: Simple Hawaiian Sliders
instructions: Heat a large skillet on medium-high (you could also use a grill or a George Foreman).Season each hamburger patty however you like then place 4 hamburger patties into the skillet at a time.Cook each patty evenly for about 5 minutes, turning as needed.Top each patty with a slice of cheese then remove from skillet once the cheese is melted.Cut each bun in ½ then fill them up with the hamburger and toppings of your choice.To make the carmelized onions: heat a small skillet to medium-high heat and sautee thinly sliced onions with a squeeze of lime juice for about 4 minutes.

steps.step: Heat a large skillet on medium-high (you could also use a grill or a George Foreman).Season each hamburger patty however you like then place 4 hamburger patties into the skillet at a time.Cook each patty evenly for about 5 minutes, turning as needed.Top each patty with a slice of cheese then remove from skillet once the cheese is melted.

Cut each bun in ½ then fill them up with the hamburger and toppings of your choice.To make the carmelized onions: heat a small skillet to medium-high heat and sautee thinly sliced onions with a squeeze of lime juice for about 4 minutes.
